contest-event.event-date:
July 17, 1926 D Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 1)
Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 1) 10 Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District Contest oxfordshire-district-contest-section-1
Labour and Love
Sports Ground, Worcester College, Oxford Open to all bands.
1st prize: Hawkes & Son Challenge Shield, £12.12.0, full set of silver medals with gold for conductor and secretary. 2nd prize: £6.6.0 3rd prize: £3.3.0
Extra prize: Higham Challenge cup for the best cornet soloist of the day, open to all sections. This cup becomes the property of any soloist winning it three years in succession.
Adjudicator notes were published in full in the Oxford Chronicle of 23/7/1926.
March 29, 2013, 9:39 a.m. March 29, 2017, 10:33 a.m.
1 Willesden C. McManus
2 Kettering Rifles P. W. Cook
3 Morris Motors Band T. Beresford
4 Hanwell Band Willie Greenwood
